title: Peanut Muffins with Yummi Nuts Peanut with Salt
ingredients: 2 cups of Yummi Nuts with Salt
instructions: Step 1: Place the peanuts in a food processor and process until they reach a liquid/creamy consistency.
Step 2: Add the honey and salt if you like. Process and place in a container.
Step 1: Preheat the oven to 350º F.
Step 2: Mix the dry ingredients in a bowl.
Step 3: Add the peanut butter and mix with a fork to a sandy consistency. Add the milk and honey and continue mixing.
Step 4: Spoon mixture evenly into muffin pan, filling ¾ full.
